tag.raw: Gustav Krupp von Bohlen und Halbach
tag.author: 76016463@N00

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Hearn Krupp von Bohlen [between ca. 1910 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph probably shows industrialist Herr Gustav Krupp von Bohlen und Halbach (1870-1950) who was the head of Friedrich Krupp AG. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2011) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.17836 Call Number: LC-B2- 3301-14
